title: U.S. household expenditure on hair care products 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the Average annual expenditure on hair and care products , 2007 2018 and per consumer unit in the U.S. from 2007 to 2018 .
In 2018 , the country 's Average expenditure on hair and care products , 2007 2018 and amounted to 89.95 U.S. dollars per consumer unit .
gold: The amount spent on hair care products annually varies over the years in the United States.
In 2018 , American consumers spent between 73.4 U.S. dollars in a year on hair care products.

Where Americans Buy Cosmetics According to a 2017 survey , over half of Americans have bought cosmetics from a Walmart or Walmart Supercenter , a higher share than any other retailer in the United States .
